text: Shin-Takashima Station (新高島駅,しんたかしまえき) is a railway station of Yokohama Minatomirai Railway Company in Nishi-ku, Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan. ==Adjacent stations== ;Yokohama Minatomirai Railway Company : Minatomirai Line ::Limited Exp., Commuter Exp., Expless :::pass ::Local :::Yokohama - Shin- Takashima - Minatomirai ==Other websites== Category:Railway stations in Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Yokohama
title: Shin-Takashima Station
